Hello everyone,

while analysing the results of one of my last crawls I stu=
mbled over
something that - at least in my eyes - seems like a bug in the
O=
nDomainsDecideRule.

Here is the story:
I'm using a DecidingScope with a On=
DomainsDecideRule.

One of my seed URLs is: 
http://www.dorfkrug.de

this s=
ite has links going to those two pages:
http://www.der-landgasthof.dorfkrug=
.de/nav/frset.html
http://www.wohnmobil-stellplatz-tunau.dorfkrug.de/nav/fr=
set.html

Now my naive perception is that those two links are both on the d=
omain
"dorfkrug.de" - thus heritrix should fetch them, too. But it seems to=

just ignore them as if they reside on a totally different domain.

So who =
is wrong? Me or heritrix ?

Thanks in advance for any help
  Olaf Freyer


=
